chapter.title: Gerim Ari'ot
chapter.para: You've probably heard the term goy used in reference to non-Jews.

The term goy seems to have a neutral connotation, where any negativity toward goy would be implied. However, it seems during the time of the Prophets and Writings, goyim started getting a bad wrap for being idol worshippers.
